author: Jacob Knutson
title: Biden says he'll follow CDC mask guidance: "Listen to the Faucis of the world"
description: Joe Biden said on ABC's "This Week" Sunday that he will follow the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's new recommendation that people wear face coverings when they leave home to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. Why it matters: After the White H…
content:
